text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump PLEASE IGNORE EVERYTHING YOU HEARD TRUMP SAY ABOUT THE CORONAVIRUS IN FEBRUARY —HOAX, IT WILL JUST MAGICALLY DISAPPEAR!! 7 GOING TO ZERO , CHLOROQUINE!! IT’S ALL FAKE! FAKE HEARING! FAKE FAKE FAKE HEARING YOU DID NOT HEAR IT, FAKE!!
#FireTrump #TrumpIsToBlame#LockHimUp
